section.6: The Book of the Times (of Prayer)

hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Aishah that the Prophet (ï·º) said:"Whoever catches up with a Rak'ah of Fajr before the sun rises, then he has caught up with it; and whoever catches up with a Rak'ah of 'Asr before the sun sets, then he has caught up with it
